paya hayaka pamana wehesakara pagamanakin anathuruwa thanithala his bimkadaka api ape kudaram atawagaththemu ,edina rathri saha pasudina mage sithum pathum malpala ganwamin sibra ,sinha ,antilop ,jiraf sathun rasak mage kachayata hasukara ganimata mama samathwunemi ,in pasu nawathath gaman aaramba kala ape pirisa wanagahanaya athi pradeshayakata lagawu pasu ehi kadawuru thanimata mama yojana kalemi , kadawuru thanana wita gammanayen pamini potarwaru dedena tharamak nosansun aakarayen hasirena bawak mata penennata thibu bawin mama malibu magin owungen ee ayidayi wimasuwemi ,pilithuru lesa wanayata athadikkala owun owunge bhashawen mona monawado kiyagena kiyagena giyeya ,malibu wisin mata pahadilikaradun aakarayata mema pedesa wasaya karana dawantha wanarayan pirisak nisa owun nosansun wi athi bawa mama danagaththemi , mage wanajiwi chayarupakarana diwiye ma kawadath anathurudayaka awasthawanta muhuna pa aththemi ,anathuruwalata biyak athinam obata kisida mewan katayuththakata elabiya nohaka ,anith aya kudaram sakaskarana atharathura mage kamarawath ragena ma kadawuru bhumiyen baharata gaman kalemi ,ek warama ma dutuwe ma siti desata wam disawen awida yana dawantha wanarayeki ,mage wimathiyata hethu wuye meya nowe ,ema wanaraya nathahoth gorilla (aththatama ema sathwa wisheshaya kumakdayi ma adatath danne natha )miniseku men depayin awida yamayi .
pardawa palanda wibhaga madhyasthanaya thulata muslim shishyawan athulath wimata shaladhipathiniya ida labanodime siddhiyak mul...

owun thama mawupiyange balakirimata wiwaha wu bawa ho wenath hethun gena hara pamin thama waradi sadharanikaranaya karannata pelambaena awastha da atha.

ehidi sanath jayasuriya pawasa sitiye ”mama dakka, mata aaranchi wuna, sanath krikat kawa kiyapu ayata honda uththarayak minissu dila thibuna, api parajayan hamuwe therim kamituwe indala wadak nathi nisayi ayin wune, idiriyedi shri lanka krikatwalata apen deyak wenna ooni nam udaw wenawa” lesinuyi.

aandolanayata thudu di athi durakathana amathum pilibanda wishleshanathmaka daththa athulath bandumkara warthawe si 350 lekhanaye pitapath jathika lekhanarakshaka departhamenthuwen dan labagatha hakiwa thibe.
eyin da, winaya pitakaya saha suthra pitakaya dharmaskandha 21,000 bagin adangu ya.
jathyanthara sabandatha saha rajya palanayedi deshapalanika washayen ehi wu sanwedithawa itha dadiyi bawa amathuwen kiwa yuthu naha.

ambaagamuwa pa්radeshiya sabha bala pa්radesha thula sinhala damila janathawa sanhidiyawen siti bawath mese kada wen kirima thulin sanhidiyawa nathiwiemi awadhanamak athiwiya haki bawath methek athibahuthara sinhala janathawak siti ambaagamuwa pa්radeshiya sabhawata ayathwa thibu shripada nallathanniye sita idikatupana dakwa bala pa්radeshaya maskeliya pa්radeshiya sabhawata ayath wima nisa sinhala janathawata agathiyak siduwana bawayi helapi්raya nandaraja mema mulika ayithiwasikami pethsamen idiripath kara aththe.
meyata waha pilithuru diya yuthu wuye maharaja mahinda wuwath ethumanan wahansege shri mukhaya wenuwata wiwara wuye ohuge wahal nadaye wahulun kipa denekuge katawal ya.

samagame anagathaya me aakarayata shakthimath wuye shri lanka maha bankuwa wisin ehi pragdhanaya saha mulya thaththwaya shakthimath kala nisa bawa da finans samagame adhyaksha saha pradhana widhayaka niladhari kamal yatawara mahatha prakasha kaleya.
ee widiyata thamayi mata mayik charithaya labenne.
lokaye wadi pramanayak welanda danwim, miyusik widiyo, chithrapata, nirmanaya kerenne pirimi manasa ilakka karagena.
ma liwime thawama abhyasaye yedenniyak.....

yehowa dewi, moses margayen dun aagnya ohu digatama pilipaddeya.+ 7 yehowa dewida hesakiya raju samanga digatama sitiyeya.+ ee nisa hesakiya raja siyalu awasthawaladi nuwanathiwa kriya kaleya.+ ohu asiriyawe rajuta sewaya nokara ohuta wiruddhawa karaligasuweya.+ 8 ohu gasa nuware desha simawa+ dakwa thibena pradeshawalada gasahi siyalu palathwalada jiwath wu pilisthiwarunwa mara damuweya.+ gasahi wishala janawasa pradeshawala pamanak nowa aatha epita pihiti kuda murakotuwala+ siti ayata pawa ohu pahara dunneya. 9 hesakiya raju palanaya kala hatharawana awuruddedi enam, eeshrayelhi raju wu eelage puth hosheya palanaya kala hathwana awuruddedi+ asiriyawe raju wu shalmaneser+ samariya wataluweya.+ 10 awurudu thunaka kalayak athulathadi ohu samariya yatath karagaththeya.+ eya hesakiya rajuge palana samaye hayawana awurudda wu athara eeshrayelhi raju wu hosheyage palana samaye nawawana awurudda wiya.+ 11 pasuwa asiriyawe raja+ eeshrayelwarunwa asiriyawata ragena gos,+ hala nam sthanayeda+ gosan ganga asala pihiti habor nam sthanayeda+ mediyawarunta ayath nuwarawalada+ padinchi karawiya. 12 me siyalla sidu wuye owun thama dewi wana yehowage handata kikaru nowi+ ohu samanga athi karagath giwisuma kada kala nisaya.+ yehowa dewige sewakaya wu moses+ owunta dun siyalu aagnya owuhu prathikshepa kaloya.+ owuhu dewita sawan dunnewath ohu ki lesa kriya kalewath natha. 13 hesakiya rajuge palana samaye dahahatharawana awuruddedi asiriyawe raju wu+ senakerib,+ yuda deshaye pawuruwalin wata wi thibu surakshitha nuwarawalata wiruddhawa yuddha kara eewa yatath karagaththeya. 14 ebawin yudahi raju wu hesakiya, lakish nagaraye siti asiriyawe rajuta paniwida yawa mese kiweya.
